title: Higher radiation dose needed to X-ray obese patients increases cancer risk

title_detail.value: Higher radiation dose needed to X-ray obese patients increases cancer risk

summary: Extremely obese people are needing a far higher dose of radiation during x-ray examinations than people of normal weight, increasing their risk of cancer, new research has shown.

summary_detail.value: Extremely obese people are needing a far higher dose of radiation during x-ray examinations than people of normal weight, increasing their risk of cancer, new research has shown.
